WorkItem.Description:
I found out that PHPExcel could not access the custom property values that SharePoint adds to a file. This limitation may apply to other applications too.
 
I'm trying to get/set the values for the custom Sjarepoint server properties values from an excel file but I cannot find a way to do it. I tried the getCustomProperties() function but the properties do not appear there. For additional information you can check the following discussion http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/discussions/359162
 
Attached is a sample file with SharePoint properties
